attributes.action: Launch and thorough and Independent inquiry into the Covid19 Pandemic asap.
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government to hold a thorough and Independent inquiry into the Government handling of the Covid19 Pandemic. I feel the Government aren't being transparent. They are not admitting to any mistakes. And I feel this could result in more lives being lost. There has to be a thorough Independent Public Inquiry as soon possible to restore confidence.
attributes.background: I feel the Government isn't being transparent and I feel that the Government are not telling the public the truth.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302576
